/* Overview */ This is an article about HD-DVD, not blu-ray. Create a separate comparison article if you wish.
Blu-Ray was not accepted by the DVD Consortium and should not be considered a "DVD" format; technically, HD-DVD is the only high-definition DVD standard. Also, HD-DVD drives have already shipped.
